entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Mont-Tremblant
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:38 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
